Design.Colors:: Mist Titanium, Deep Ocean Blue, Solar Orange, Mocha Brown, Torino Black, Frost Silver
Design.Materials:: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), aluminum frame, aluminum back
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, heart rate, SpO2
Design.Resistance::
IP64 dust tight and water resistant (water splashes)
RGB notification light & active matrix display (on the back)

Battery.Charging::
90W wired, 50% in 16 min, 100% in 41 min (6500 mAh)
90W wired, 50% in 14 min, 100% in 35 min (6000 mAh)
30W wireless
7.5W reverse wired
5W reverse wireless
Bypass Charging (gaming, navigating)

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, heart rate, SpO2

Cellular.SIM type:: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 3 major Android upgrades, XOS 16

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, heart rate, SpO2
